Articles.Content: Hey guys, this is my first post, and let me say I love KSP for military missle simulations. I messed around a lot with ICBM's... and all kinds of mods but I think my favorite is HYPERSONICS! I created a cruise missle on stock KSP, which reached a maximum of Mach 5.56, and made it about 2000 miles in 20 minutes. I felt very impressed and entertained. What have yours guys experiences been with developing missiles on this game? Seen some really cool stuff.

Welcome to the forums! 

Gotta say...that’s pretty impressive! Do you have a screen shot of that sucker in action?

Personally, as a person with a computer that is full on anti-mod, I just make planes that can deploy fuel tanks and I drop them on kerbalnauts that have landed on the ground or I drop them on drones that need to be taken care of
2000 mi in 20 minutes is like.. 2700 m/s average speed. I suspect this is a case of believing the F3 distance readouts which you should never ever do.
